title: The Christian souldier. Or, Preparation for battaile. A legend containing true rules for a souldier, in whom at once is met religion and resolution. Published by a well-willer to the gown and sword, T.J.
author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?
notes: Anonymously published by Thomas Jordan -- Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
